mapper.select: select article_comment.id,articleCommentArticleId,articleCommentUserId,name,articleCommentContent from article_comment join user on article_comment.articleCommentUserId = user.id

select article_comment.id,articleCommentArticleId,articleCommentUserId,name,articleCommentContent from article_comment join user on article_comment.articleCommentUserId = user.id where article_comment.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into article_comment (articleCommentArticleId, articleCommentUserId, articleCommentContent) values (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{content})
